item.description:
Just $12 per person, you can buy tickets when you arrive. Here is what their website has to say...

"Our Haunted Halloween Maze is among the scariest in the area and this year will grow to cover 4 acres of spooky fun. Dress warmly for the haunted hayride across the Merrimac River, it is the beginning of your scary adventure. Once at the halloween maze, you will be haunted by ghosts and ghouls of all kinds!"

Their website is: http://www.kimballfar...


***Rates for the Haunted Maze or Haunted Hayride, the cost for each is $12 for adults, $10 for kids. The cost for a combined ticket to do both is $18 for adults, $15 for kids.
item.name: Haunted Halloween Maze at Kimball Farms in Haverhill!
